title: "Mountain Zen"
content:
# Mountain Zen

Welcome to Mountain Zen, your ultimate destination for meditation and wellness. Our serene mountain landscape with a clear blue lake provides the perfect backdrop for relaxation and mindfulness. 

At Mountain Zen, we believe that finding inner peace is essential for a healthy mind and body. That's why we offer a variety of resources to help you achieve a state of calm and tranquility. From guided meditations to yoga classes, our platform has everything you need to start your journey towards a more peaceful life.

Our team of experienced instructors and wellness experts are here to guide you every step of the way. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced practitioner, we have something for everyone. 

Join us today and discover the power of Mountain Zen.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A serene mountain landscape with a clear blue lake for a meditation or wellness website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
